title: 9 Simple Steps to Add an Event to Google Calendar

steps.title: Log into your Google account.
steps.content: Log into your Google account. Use your email and password. This is required to use Google Calendar. If you don't have a Google account, learn to create one now!

steps.title: Visit the Google Calendar page using the top navigation.
steps.content: Visit the Google Calendar page using the top navigation. Alternatively, you can click here to go to the page.

steps.title: Click the create button located near the top left corner.
steps.content: Click the create button located near the top left corner.

steps.title: A page will pop up.
steps.content: A page will pop up. Enter the name of the event. Then enter the date, time, and other options.

steps.title: Enter where the event will take place.
steps.content: Enter where the event will take place. You can also add a Meet video call or a description of the event.

steps.title: You can add guests to your event, and manage their permissions.
steps.content: You can add guests to your event, and manage their permissions. This is not required.

steps.title: Change the appearance of how the event will appear on the calendar.
steps.content: Change the appearance of how the event will appear on the calendar. You can also add reminders by email and pop-up.

steps.title: Change the availability and privacy options.
steps.content: Change the availability and privacy options.

steps.title: When you are finished editing your event, click the save button.
steps.content: When you are finished editing your event, click the save button.
